text: Richard Lee Petty (born July 2, 1937) is a former NASCAR racing driver. Petty won 200 Cup races, more than any other driver in the NASCAR Cup Series. Richard has also won the Winston Cup (now NASCAR Cup Series) seven times. Only Dale Earnhardt, Jimmie Johnson and Petty have this championship seven times. Richard is often called "The King" of NASCAR. ==References== Category:NASCAR drivers Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Daytona 500 winners Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina
